description: Clump object management in PFC - rigid aggregates of pebbles (overlapping spheres) used to model complex particle shapes

functions.name: containing
functions.description: Find the clump containing the point. Returns the clump whose volume contains the given point.

returns.description: Clump object containing the point, or None if no clump contains it

functions.name: count
functions.description: Get total number of clumps in the model. O(1) operation - very fast.

returns.description: Number of clumps currently in the model

functions.name: energies
functions.description: Get all clump energy contributions as a dictionary. Returns all available energy types with their total values summed across all clumps.

returns.description: Dictionary mapping energy names to their total values. Keys include 'energy-body', 'energy-damp', 'energy-kinetic'

functions.name: energy
functions.description: Get the clump total energy contribution. This is the sum over all clumps of the energy with name energy_name (see the set energy command). Available energies are: 'energy-body', 'energy-damp' and 'energy-kinetic'.

functions.name: find
functions.description: Find clump by ID number. Returns None if clump doesn't exist. Finding by ID is O(1) - very fast.

returns.description: Clump object if found, None if ID doesn't exist

functions.name: inbox
functions.signature: itasca.clump.inbox(lower_bound: vec, upper_bound: vec, intersect: bool = True) -> tuple[Clump, ...]
functions.description: Get a tuple of clumps with extents intersecting a box. The extent is the axis-aligned bounding box of the clump. If intersect=False, only clumps with positions falling in the box are returned.

parameters.name: lower_bound
parameters.description: Lower bound of the box (x, y, z)

parameters.name: upper_bound
parameters.description: Upper bound of the box (x, y, z)

parameters.name: intersect
parameters.description: If True, return clumps with extents intersecting box. If False, only clumps with positions in box (default: True)

returns.description: Tuple of clump objects in the specified box

functions.name: list
functions.description: Return an iterator over all clumps in the model. Returns iterator (not list). Order not guaranteed. Use list(it.clump.list()) to create snapshot before modifying during iteration.

functions.name: maxid
functions.description: Get the maximum clump ID currently in the model.

functions.name: near
functions.description: Find the closest clump to a point. If radius is non-zero, only search within this radius.

parameters.name: point
parameters.description: Point to search from (x, y, z)

parameters.name: radius
parameters.description: Search radius. If 0.0, search entire model (default: 0.0)

returns.description: Closest clump object, or None if no clump found within radius
